chunk-50eba34c0c8657212308ea6534716553.description: Aspect-level sentiment classification is the task of determining sentiment polarity towards a specific target within a sentence. It is the main focus of the paper, aiming to classify sentiment towards specific aspects within text.

chunk-6d8118bdf1f553a8ea6f4ffad4e15eaf.description: Tang et al., 2016 are researchers whose work is referenced in the context of dataset removal of conflicting polarities and comparison with the PRET+MULT model in the experiments.
Pontiki et al. are researchers associated with the creation of benchmark aspect-level datasets from SemEval 2014, 2015, and 2016.
